name: Teacher Melody
des: Oh, this clothes, don’t mention it! Teacher Bean wants me to wear the same clothes with him, who knows the reason.

name: Teacher Savage
des: My name is savage, but in fact I am very gentle, remember once a door fell down, I hold the door with one hand, hold the students with another hand, I am very gentle, right?

name: Teacher Fairy
des: I'm an art teacher, look at this dress, it's my design, the students' drawing ability can certainly be improved with me

name: Teacher Carl
des:
No, I don't know that Mario, he just walked past me, and I was shocked too.
I need to pay attention to the choice of clothing, I don’t want to wear the same clothing with others.

name: Teacher Maruko
des:
I am teacher Maruko, and I like to play naughty with my classmates!
Don't give them so much homework, the children should just have fun~

name: Teacher Peter
des:
Don't make me angry or I’ll summon Pikachu to punish you with a hundred thousand volts!
Just kidding, I like this kind of humorous teaching style ~

name: Teacher Bean
des: Why I wear a helmet? Well... Because last time I was walking and looking at my phone, I bumped into a tree, so I won’t get hurt if I wear a helmet.

name: Teacher Strong
des:
Last time I participated in a bullfight and I won first place, this is the first prize, look!
Is there such a competition in our school?

name: Teacher Beard
des:
What is art? Art is explo... Emm, art is to present the picture that is in your mind on the drawing board
Well done! (Luckily, I didn't say that mantra)

name: Teacher Popeye
des:
You say I look like Mario? Yes! A lot of people say that, and I'm used to it.
They say I was born like Popeye, so they named me  Popeye.

name: Teacher Lucky
des:
See the red costume I'm wearing? I'm the Lucky who brings good luck to the school!
Every thing will be good!

name: Teacher Strict
des: As long as I'm in the classroom, students do not dare to desert and cheat in class. Shh… That’s because my class students are running away~

name: Teacher Bald
des: I had a fight with the bald principal in another school, and he pulled out my hair that cost me a lot of money to transplant.

name: Teacher Quiet
des: The bald principal of another school thinks I'm too long-winded, and every time I teach, my classmates tell me: Be quiet, teacher!

name: Teacher Glasses
des: I'm a good teacher, my students love my classes, and I have many ways to fix those naughty students!
